text.div:
V3 Value SetParticipationTargetLocation

The facility where the service is done. May be a static building (or room therein) or a moving location (e.g., ambulance, helicopter, aircraft, train, truck, ship, etc.)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a LOC

name: v3.ParticipationTargetLocation
title: V3 Value SetParticipationTargetLocation
description: The facility where the service is done.  May be a static building (or room therein) or a moving location (e.g., ambulance, helicopter, aircraft, train, truck, ship, etc.)
